about.description: Hi! My name is Edson Arturo Rodr√≠guez Govea and I am a Full Stack Developer with a passion for building beautiful and user-friendly websites. I have a strong understanding of both front-end and back-end development, and I am excited to put my skills to use in a professional setting. I am a quick learner and a team player, and I am really confident that I can be a valuable asset to any web development team!

freeway.description: FreeWay is a startup company focused on the development of mobile applications for freight using the software development methodology Scrum

highlights.developmentOfAMobile: Develompent of a mobile application using the Flutter framework and consuming information through GraphQL queries, where a CRUD was created for the cargo services flow in a freight transport application. In addition to this, by being a team lead, I actively participate in giving feedback to other developers by doing code reviews, pair coding or simply chatting to find the best possible solution.
highlights.iServedAs: I served as team lead of a mobile development team, actively using the Scrum methodology preparing Sprint planning, Sprint retrospectives as well as creating tickets for new features or issues.

hmh.description: Software company specialized in web development using React.js and Vue.js

highlights.participatedInThe: Participated in the management of a medicine delivery application where I worked with the Google Maps Platform API creating Polylines, user interfaces and real-time tracking of the shipment. This implementing the GMaps API as well as Vue.js and Sass
highlights.reMake: Re-make UX-UI in point of sale application, this new experience was developed using Vue.js and SASS using the BEM methodology

itj.description: I worked as a fullstack developer at this consultancy for the client "XiltriX", using React, TypeScript, Node, Redux, and other technologies to handle a device monitoring website.

highlights.migrated: Migrated a legacy application to an updated version solving vulnerabilities issues, deprecated packages and upgrade the code structure in order to make it more easy to understand and to mantain
highlights.prepared: Prepared the approach for the new version of the project visualizing the new tendencies of the development software

rocket.description: I worked as a frontend developer at this consultancy for "Principal Financial Group Mexico," using React, TypeScript, and Sass technologies to handle an Investment Funds website.

highlights.assistedIn: I assisted in planning tasks for each sprint, holding regular meetings with other members of the development team as well as stakeholders to ensure well-refined and easily developable tasks.
highlights.createdComp: I created components from scratch using a library established by the client as a base, adding extra functionalities, new styling approaches, etc.

sonatafy.description: Management and update of the customer administrative tools, based on automated tests and agile communications between systems.

highlights.creationOf: Creation of endpoints through Node.js consuming information from a PostgreSQL database.
highlights.developmentOf: Development of a custom component library from scratch for the client using Vue2 (Options API), taking as reference the most popular ones on the market such as Buefy or Vuetify, focusing on the needs and preferences of the client.

universityOfColima.description: I graduated as a "Software Engineer" after studying for a period of 8 semesters at the faculty of telematics of the University of Colima.
